summary:
Faelar can be found at the Old Hroldan Inn, in the Reach.
Perks included: Overdraw, Lightfoot, Agile Defender and Dual Flurry.
Level scheme: Combat warrior 1 handed.
descriptionHtml:
Description
===========
Faelar is a male Bosmer/Wood Elf specializing in 1 handed attacks.


Details
=======
When you find him at the Old Hroldan Inn, he will be wearing farming clothes and will only have a few items in his inventory, including a Hunting Bow, 2 Iron Swords and some Arrows. This ensures that you can equip him with any weapons and armor that you want!

He was made with the NPC Editor in a couple of minutes so please let me know if there is anything I need to add/improve.

Misc
========
There is also a separate vanilla eyes version, just in case you have issues with Flans eyes.
I use Fine Face Textures and Better Males Sundracon meshes by Urshi
(Sundracon Male Body - NEVERNUDE Version with underwear)
In the other screenshots his armor is the Apotheus Light Armor.


Required files
=======
Flans Eyes for Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14539
Apachii hair male V1.1 - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
It\'s not required (I think) but he may look different if you don\'t have Ethereal Elven Overhaul.

Install (Manually)
=======
1. Download and extract.
2. Locate the Skyrim directory and drop the files into the \'Data\' folder.
3. Check the .esp and enjoy!

Install (NMM)
========
1. Well you probably already know what to do, so get to it!


Uninstall
=========
1. Uncheck the .esp file.
2. Delete the .esp from the \'Data\' folder in the Skyrim Directory!


Incompatibility
===============
I haven\'t encountered anything so far, but if you do please let me know. Fufufu~


Contact
=======
Feel free to message me or comment with any suggestions/questions and I\'ll get back to you ASAP!
author: Alida
